hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select "ID" AS "vehicleId", "TYPE" AS "vehicleType", "NAME" AS "vehicleName" from "M_VEHICLE_TYPE" where "DEL_FLG" = 0

select uservehicle."ID" AS "userVehicleId", uservehicle."VEHICLE_ID" AS "vehicleId", uservehicle."VEHICLE_NO" AS "vehicleNo", vehicletype."TYPE" AS "vehicleType", vehicletype."NAME" AS "vehicleTypeName" from "T_USER_VEHICLE" as uservehicle JOIN "M_VEHICLE_TYPE" as vehicletype ON ( uservehicle."VEHICLE_ID" = vehicletype."ID" ) where uservehicle."DEL_FLG" = 0 AND vehicletype."DEL_FLG" = 0 AND uservehicle."USER_ID" = :userId
